body:
Hi Mostapha



This is Ladan, I hope you are doing well. Congratulation on the great success of your tool! this is amazing! I could see this coming many years ago :) I have one question for you. Can you read the daylighting annual results created by RADIANCE/DAYSIM in your EnergyPlus file and modify the lighting schedule based on the illuminance values calculated by RADIANCE? 



Thank you so much

Ladan
topic: Integrating Daylighting Results to Energy Analysis
